sentences.en: a black dog with a white patch on its back
sentences.cn: 背上有一块白斑的黑狗

sentences.en: a cat with a white patch on its chest
sentences.cn: 胸部有一块白斑的猫

sentences.en: a jacket with leather patches at the elbows
sentences.cn: 肘部有皮革补丁的短上衣

sentences.en: Handsome, she thought, but not a patch on Alex.
sentences.cn: 是帅，她想，不过比亚历克斯差远了。

sentences.en: He and Walker patched the barn roof.
sentences.cn: 他和沃克修补了那个谷仓的顶。

sentences.en: He combs his hair over his bald patch .
sentences.cn: 他把头发梳过来盖住秃掉的地方。

sentences.en: He had a patch on the elbow of his jacket.
sentences.cn: 他的上衣肘部有一块补丁.

sentences.en: he no longer looked so handsome—he wasn't a patch on Peter.
sentences.cn: 看上去他已不再那么英俊，远比不上彼得。

sentences.en: He's not a patch on the rest of the Cabinet.
sentences.cn: 他远比不上内阁的其他成员。

sentences.en: His marriage was going through a bad patch.
sentences.cn: 他的婚姻当时麻烦不断。

sentences.en: His new book isn't a patch on his others.
sentences.cn: 他的新书比以前所写的差得远.

sentences.en: Look out for icy patches on the road.
sentences.cn: 小心路上结冰的地方。

sentences.en: Only a tiny patch of blue was visible in the cloudy sky.
sentences.cn: 多云的天空中只见到一小块儿湛蓝.

sentences.en: The company I work for went through a rough patch.
sentences.cn: 我所在的公司经历了一段困难时期。

sentences.en: The patch enables smokers to wean themselves off cigarettes very gradually.
sentences.cn: 这张贴片能使吸烟者很缓慢地把烟戒掉.

sentences.en: There was a patch of waste land behind the church.
sentences.cn: 教堂的后面有一块荒地。

sentences.en: They managed to patch it up.
sentences.cn: 他们终于和好了。

sentences.en: They tried digging in a patch just below the cave.
sentences.cn: 他们试着在洞穴正下方的一块地上挖掘。

sentences.en: This patch looks a bit unprofessional.
sentences.cn: 这块补丁有点像出自外行之手.

sentences.en: Try to patch things up between them, will you?
sentences.cn: 你去给他们说和说和.

sentences.en: We can patch up those holes.
sentences.cn: 我们可以修补这些破洞。

sentences.en: We’ll have to patch up the hole in the roof.
sentences.cn: 我们得修补屋顶上的洞。

words.tran_cn: 不调和的；拼凑成的；有补丁的
眼罩；斑点；碎片；小块土地

phrases.tran_cn: 在有些部分；在有些时候
n. [医]斑片试验；皮肤过敏试验

trans.tran_cn: 补丁，补片，眼罩，斑点，小块
trans.tran_en: a small piece of material that is sewn on something to cover a hole in it
to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it

trans.tran_cn: 修补，拼凑，暂时遮掩一下，修理，平息（吵架等），用美人斑装饰（脸）
trans.tran_en: to repair a hole in something by putting a piece of something else over it
